overview:
Jeremy is a Senior Director at Socialbakers and heads up the UK and Ireland region. Based out of the Socialbakers London office he is responsible for expansion of the region, building out the team and ensuring customer success.

Prior to Socialbakers, Jeremy was a Sales Director at CRM vendor RightNow Technologies, where he spent 7 years growing the EMEA region prior to acquisition by Oracle Corporation in late 2011. Prior to RightNow, Jeremy held various senior sales roles in leading software organisations.

relationships.title: Sr. Director - Head of UK & Ireland
